description:
These core principles have guided me during my (almost) two decades in
the business. I'll share some real-world stories to show what kind of
results you can expect.

The tips:

-  Just ask.
-  Listen for intent.
-  Create the minimum thing.
-  Cultivate ownership, individual and product.
-  Be a lifelong learner.
-  Opt in.
-  Use the power of storytelling.

There might even be a surprise bonus tip.
title: 7 Essential Tips for the Enlightened Tech Writer
